name: StarCheck
description:
A simple, fun strategy game (a version of Chinese checkers) for young and old. For two, three, four or six players.

Play a game with:
• two players, each with one, two, or three homes,
• three players, each with one or two homes,
• four players, each with one home, or
• six players, each with one home.

Where there are unowned homes, you can choose whether they are closed to moves.

Turn sounds on or off.
